labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home x64 Fall Creators Update (Build 1709, 16299.64)
data.actual_result: It automatically resets itself after following the aforementioned steps and is not working at all
data.expected_result: It should be recorded in Overlay settings and working as usual in games if additionally set at Keybinds settings
data.short_description: Toggle Overlay Lock Keybind is not working in games & you can't set it via Overlay Settings, it resets itself every time
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Settings - Go to Overlay section and set a Keybind for Toggle Overlay Lock - Go to i.e. Voice & Video settings, then come back to Overlay ones and see the result for yourself - After that, try to set this specific Keybind in Keybinds section - Open any game and try to use it
